verses.verse: What <S%G5101><s%> shall we <S%G2046>say<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> that <S%G11>Abraham<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G3962>father,<s%> as <S%G2596>pertaining<s%> to the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> hath <S%G2147>found?<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G11>Abraham<s%> were <S%G1344>justified<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> <S%G2041>works,<s%> he <S%G2192>hath<s%> whereof to <S%G2745>glory;<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G4314>before<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1124>Scripture?<s%> <S%G1161><s%> <S%G11>Abraham<s%> <S%G4100>believed<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> it was <S%G3049>counted<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness.<s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> to him that <S%G2038>worketh<s%> is <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3408>reward<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3049>reckoned<s%> <S%G2596>of<s%> <S%G5485>grace,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2596>of<s%> <S%G3783>debt.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> to him that <S%G2038>worketh<s%> <S%G3361>not,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G4100>believeth<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> him that <S%G1344>justifieth<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G765>ungodly,<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> is <S%G3049>counted<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness.<s%>

Even <S%G2509>as<s%> <S%G1138>David<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3004>describeth<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3108>blessedness<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G444>man,<s%> unto <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3049>imputeth<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> <S%G5565>without<s%> <S%G2041>works,<s%>
Saying, <S%G3107>Blessed<s%> are they <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G458>iniquities<s%> are <S%G863>forgiven,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G266>sins<s%> are <S%G1943>covered.<s%>
Blessed <S%G3107><s%> is the <S%G435>man<s%> to <S%G3739>whom<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> will <S%G3364>not<s%> <S%G3049>impute<s%> <S%G266>sin.<s%>

Cometh <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3108>blessedness<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4061>circumcision<s%> only, <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G203>uncircumcision<s%> <S%G2532>also?<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> we <S%G3004>say<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> was <S%G3049>reckoned<s%> to <S%G11>Abraham<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness.<s%>

How <S%G4459><s%> was it <S%G3767>then<s%> <S%G3049>reckoned?<s%> when he <S%G5607>was<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4061>circumcision,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G203>uncircumcision?<s%> <S%G3756>Not<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4061>circumcision,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G203>uncircumcision.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G2983>received<s%> the <S%G4592>sign<s%> of <S%G4061>circumcision,<s%> a <S%G4973>seal<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> he had yet being uncircumcised: <S%G1722>that<s%> <S%G203><s%> <S%G846>he<s%> might <S%G1511>be<s%> the <S%G3962>father<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> them that <S%G4100>believe,<s%> though they be not <S%G1223>circumcised;<s%> <S%G203><s%> that <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> might be <S%G3049>imputed<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%> also: <S%G2532><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3962>father<s%> of <S%G4061>circumcision<s%> to <S%G3588>them<s%> who are <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G4061>circumcision<s%> <S%G3440>only,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> who also <S%G4748>walk<s%> <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2487>steps<s%> of that <S%G4102>faith<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G11>Abraham,<s%> which he had being yet <S%G1722>uncircumcised.<s%> <S%G203><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1860>promise,<s%> that <S%G846>he<s%> should <S%G1511>be<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2818>heir<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2889>world,<s%> was <S%G3756>not<s%> to <S%G11>Abraham,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> to <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G4690>seed,<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G3551>law,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> of <S%G4102>faith.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G3588>they<s%> which are <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> be <S%G2818>heirs,<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> is made <S%G2758>void,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1860>promise<s%> made of none effect: <S%G2673><s%>

Because <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G2716>worketh<s%> <S%G3709>wrath:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G3757>where<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G2076>is,<s%> there is <S%G3761>no<s%> <S%G3847>transgression.<s%>

Therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> it is <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G4102>faith,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> it might be <S%G2596>by<s%> <S%G5485>grace;<s%> to the end <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1860>promise<s%> might <S%G1511>be<s%> <S%G949>sure<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4690>seed;<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> to <S%G3588>that<s%> <S%G3440>only<s%> which is <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3551>law,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> to <S%G3588>that<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> which is <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G4102>faith<s%> of <S%G11>Abraham;<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G3962>father<s%> of <S%G2257>us<s%> <S%G3956>all,<s%>

(As <S%G2531><s%> it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> I have <S%G5087>made<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%> a <S%G3962>father<s%> of <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G1484>nations,)<s%> <S%G2713>before<s%> him <S%G3739>whom<s%> he <S%G4100>believed,<s%> even <S%G2316>God,<s%> who <S%G2227>quickeneth<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3498>dead,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2564>calleth<s%> those things which <S%G5607>be<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> as <S%G5613>though<s%> they <S%G5607>were.<s%>

Who <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3844>against<s%> <S%G1680>hope<s%> <S%G4100>believed<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> <S%G1680>hope,<s%> that <S%G846>he<s%> might <S%G1096>become<s%> the <S%G3962>father<s%> of <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G1484>nations,<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to that which was <S%G2046>spoken,<s%> <S%G3779>So<s%> shall <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G4690>seed<s%> <S%G2071>be.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> being not <S%G770>weak<s%> <S%G3361><s%> in <S%G4102>faith,<s%> he <S%G2657>considered<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> his <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G4983>body<s%> <S%G2235>now<s%> <S%G3499>dead,<s%> when he <S%G5225>was<s%> <S%G4225>about<s%> a hundred years <S%G1541>old,<s%> <S%G2532>neither<s%> yet <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3500>deadness<s%> of <S%G4564>Sarah's<s%> womb: <S%G3388><s%>

He <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1252>staggered<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1519>at<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1860>promise<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> through <S%G570>unbelief;<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> was <S%G1743>strong<s%> in <S%G4102>faith,<s%> <S%G1325>giving<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> to <S%G2316>God;<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> being fully <S%G4135>persuaded<s%> <S%G3754>that,<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> he had <S%G1861>promised,<s%> he <S%G2076>was<s%> <S%G1415>able<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> to <S%G4160>perform.<s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1352>therefore<s%> it was <S%G3049>imputed<s%> to <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness.<s%>
Now <S%G1161><s%> it was <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1125>written<s%> for his <S%G1223>sake<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G3440>alone,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> it was <S%G3049>imputed<s%> to <S%G846>him;<s%>

But <S%G235><s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G2532>also,<s%> to <S%G3739>whom<s%> it <S%G3195>shall<s%> be <S%G3049>imputed,<s%> if <S%G3588>we<s%> <S%G4100>believe<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> him that raised <S%G1453>up<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3498>dead;<s%>

Who <S%G3739><s%> was <S%G3860>delivered<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G3900>offenses,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> was raised <S%G1453>again<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G1347>justification.<s%>
